shared.validation.required: This value may not be empty
shared.validation.min-length-n: The value must consist of at least {n} characters
shared.validation.max-length-n: The value must not consist of more than {n} characters
shared.validation.min-value-n: The value must be bigger than {n}
shared.validation.max-value-n: The value must be smaller than {n}
shared.validation.min-value-including-n: The value must not be smaller than {n}
shared.validation.max-value-including-n: The value must not be bigger than {n}
shared.validation.duplicate: An entry with this name already exists
shared.validation.invalid-email: The value is not a valid email address
shared.validation.invalid-date: The value is not a valid date
shared.validation.invalid-number: The value is not a valid number
shared.validation.array-not-empty: At least on entry is required
